== Madikehalli (612523) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Madikehalli is a village in the [[Kunigal ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 237.52 hectares and harbouring 306 households with total population of 1161 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunigal]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 580 and female population is 581. Scheduled Caste Population is 82 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2. Census Location Code of the village is 612523<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 665 (57.28%)
* Literate male population: 382 (65.86%)
* Literate female population: 283 (48.71%)
